pages.text: The Flame Flower is a remarkable specimen that thrives in heat. Its vibrant ember-like petals radiate warmth, and stepping on it provides protection from fire.$(br2)First discovered growing near lava pools, this magical plant has become a cornerstone of fire-based arcane botany.
Flame Flower blooms can be harvested to extract Spell Essence: Flame, a powerful component in fire magic. The seeds require Grove Soil to grow properly.

pages.title: Cultivation
pages.text: The Flame Flower grows through three distinct stages: Seed, Bud, and Bloom. Growth accelerates significantly when exposed to heat sources such as lava, fire, or even the Nether's ambient temperature.$(br2)Harvest only when fully bloomed for best results.
